OOC: hehe, I'd say that the Maximals, The Alliance, and The 
Mutants are winning. The Decepticons are severly out numbered, 
*ouch* 

::Rippersnapper::
Rippersnapper hears Hun-Grr. He leaps over, dodging through fire, 
then forms into his part of Abominus.

On 2 Apr 2001, at 21:50, Alloran2@... wrote:

> :::Hun-Grr:::
> 
> ::he sees that the battle was deep in progress, but no side appeared(to him) 
> to be winning.  It was time to tip the odds::
> Hun-grr: TERRORCONS! MERGE AND FORM ABOMINUS!
> OOC: Alright guys, remember the order we worked out! (Me, Rdahl, Dcoburn, 
> Rauq, and Soulstice).
